title: Two die from drinking alcohol in Pabna
body: Two young men died allegedly from drinking alcohol in the Pabna district headquarters early Friday. The deceased were Sumon Sarkar, 35, of Gopalpur Mohalla, and Mamun, 32, of Radhanagar Maktab in the district headquarters. The Pabna police officer-in-charge Dulal Uddin confirmed the matter on Friday. Several people said that they had died from drinking liquor at a local bar. Additional superintendent of police Md. Mashiur Rahman said that alcohol consumption was mentioned as the cause of their death.
